data.name: Seahorse Pools & Spas
data.address: 3100 Alta Mere Dr, Fort Worth, TX 76116

reviews.text: 3100 Alta Mere Dr, Fort Worth, TX 76116 Darron is awesome! Cleaned our filters and they look like new! 😊 thank you
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"Customer service was top notch from the design process to weekly service!" "Finally, hats off to George (Service Mgr) for his excellent work and support." "Great people to work with , our pool is a year old ."

From start to finish we love our new pool. Seahorse was great to work with. Shannon showed us 3D renderings from our ideas and really helped us make decisions on the design and materials, which turned out beautiful! The work crews were very … More Response from the owner a month ago

Seahorse pools and Spas is the best ever.  We have used them for over 25 years and we’ve never had an issue. Darron just finished cleaning our filter and he did a wonderful job.  Very professional and knowledgeable about what he was doing. … More Response from the owner a month ago Thanks for the review James! It's been a pleasure working with you for so many years.

David, Seahorse Pool service tech arrived to my service call request and it was all good from start to finish. David returned the freeze guard monitor  from not-operational to operational in record time. I was very satisfied with Seahorse Pools and David their highly experienced pool technician.  Richard Frazer Response from the owner 2 weeks ago
Thanks Richard, we appreciate your 20+ years of being a great Seahorse Pools client!
